website_summaries.verdict: This 24-pack of soft yet durable toilet paper comes at an affordable price without sacrificing quality.
pros: This toilet paper is rip-resistant without being tough
Soft material is pleasing to use for many individuals
Rolls are long lasting due to durability of paper
Despite rolls having a sizable diameter, these fit well on most toilet paper holders
cons: Not very resistant to rips once wet

customer_reviews.title: Disintegrates as you use it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the positive reviews and was looking for a no/low-lint decently strong but soft toilet paper. I usually really like Amazon products, and I don't usually write reviews (positive or negative), but this is the absolute worst toilet paper I have ever used. It disintegrates as you use it. I was going to try to use up what I have and then buy something else, but it's so bad that I'm going to just get rid of the remaining rolls and get something different. Really, really disappointed in this product and can't understand the positive reviews. Totally wasted my money on this one.
customer_reviews.author: terpsichore9

customer_reviews.title: WILL NOT BUY AGAIN. NOT AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: This toilet tissue was advertised as being comparable to Charmin Extras Soft. It is NOTHING like Charmin. The tissue is rough and thin-nothing like Charmin. I have purchased other Amazon brands with good results, such as their paper towels, but I won't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Hill

customer_reviews.title: I have stopped squeezing the Charmin!
customer_reviews.text: First I thought, "Amazon toilet paper, ha ha ha ha ha ha!!!!!" Then I thought I would read the reviews to flush out the truth. After reading all the good reviews, I thought; well maybe it's actually good. So, I took the plunge and ordered some. Yes, I was very pleasantly surprised upon receiving my order. Like others have pointed out, the rolls are big and the sheets are thicker than most others. And yes, they do the job very nicely, and one can use less paper, thus, saving even more bucks. So, okay Mr. Whipple, it looks like I will stop squeezing Charmin now, because I have fallen in love with a new main squeeze.
customer_reviews.author: John Campbell

customer_reviews.title: pretty scratchy. I had high hopes because it was ...
customer_reviews.text: The item is comparable to a Scott or store brand. Not very soft, pretty scratchy. I had high hopes because it was an Amazon product. Nothing like Charmin or Cottonelle.
customer_reviews.author: Jim E.

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect consistency
customer_reviews.text: Got these in and opened the package and was met with a super skinny roll, there weren't 2 rolls cut the same size in width... Thumbs down Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: B Rickey

customer_reviews.title: AVOID AT ALL COSTS
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst toilet paper I've ever had the misfortune to be stuck with, and stuck is a VERY appropriate word here. I'm going to try to get my money back cause this stuff is complete trash. Don't buy unless you like confetti in all your parts you were hoping to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Better than contonelle!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Amazon!! This is now officially my favorite toilet tissue ever. Super thick and soft, that you barely even need to use a few squares per potty visit. I have been diehard on contonelle but now that I've tried this I will be ordering it whenever I'm out of tp. The rolls are HUGE! For me this is a good thing. May post a problem for those that have fixed toilet paper holdings onto the wall. I have a free standing f holder so this doesn't much effect me. I have really long nails and this toilet paper does not rip when I wipe. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Horwath

customer_reviews.title: Not like Charmin at all
customer_reviews.text: this was supposed to be compared to Charmin as other reviews said. Not even close. As others said there were some rolls softer than others in the package. No consistency at all. I ended up throwing away the last few rolls because they were like sand paper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but leaves white flakes everywhere
customer_reviews.text: The toilet paper flakes off and leaves white specks everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Arlaana

customer_reviews.title: Great TP!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say this is the best toilet paper that’s not a major brand. I thought it was going to be cheap and flimsy and that it is not. This toilet paper came through and is actually really good. I would use this over any major brand any day.
customer_reviews.author: Pattydee

customer_reviews.title: We like
customer_reviews.text: We like this tissue paper. It is soft and strong with 3 ply. The mega rolls last a long time. I also noticed there is no lint with this brand. Will reorder and recommend. Oh yea, price is really good!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer827

customer_reviews.title: VERY MESSY, paper sheds bad and dust fills the room,  leaves paper pieces under the roll holder...
customer_reviews.text: Warning: Very Messy! There is so many loose pieces, lint and dust in this paper it makes a huge mess. I even tried to shake it off outside but there’s still a pile of lint and paper pieces covering the floor under the toilet paper roll holders in every bathroom, every day. Lint and dust flies in the air onto everything in the room. What a mistake, I’m throwing the rest out. It’s not worth cleaning up after every day.
customer_reviews.author: DHolliy

customer_reviews.title: Confusion over count answered!
customer_reviews.text: Hope this clears up confusion. Even Amazon did not know actual number of rolls in this order, they told me I would receive 1 package of 6 rolls which they said was "equivalent " of 24 rolls. WRONG! I received as I thought, 4 packages of 6 rolls for total of 24 rolls, forget that the single package says 24 rolls. These are large "mega" rolls similar to what you would get with Charmin. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Bart H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I ended up trying this brand because of the reviews. I must say I am seriously impressed by Amazon. These rolls are mega rolls, super strong and soft! My husband usually likes Scotts but we are switching over to Presto because we are impressed. I didn’t have any issues with any toilet crumbs left behind like other did. They arrived fast and probably will last us a while because the rolls are very thick!
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof2Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Jumbo roll that fits!  Soft too!
customer_reviews.text: Finally someone came up with a brilliant idea to solve the problem of jumbo rolls not fitting on "standard" sized toilet paper holders. These rolls are a just teeny bit narrower than those I normally purchase at the store. Thus, they do not rub on the edges of my toilet paper holder. They do just barely touch the wall, but it only took one use for that to stop being a problem - and it really wasn't even a problem at all. Also, it's soft and doesn't seem to be too dusty. i.e. it doesn't leave a bunch of paper residue all over the place like some "soft" brands tend to do. I think I've found my new TP distributor!
customer_reviews.author: debhibb

customer_reviews.title: Keep the good quality and promises Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality! Large rolls (better than Costco’s brands) I really glad Amazon provided such quality products at everyday prices. Please keep offering this quality paper product. I was able to get these fulfilled even when they were out of stock at my regular Subscribe and save period. Thank you Amazon for keeping the promises and quality
customer_reviews.author: Anna G

customer_reviews.title: Best TP...comparable to Northern 3-ply
customer_reviews.text: I find this TP to have the near-thickness of Northern 3-ply, but it's 2-ply with the same degree of softness, thickness and absorbance. As for the price, it's comparable to what you pay when Northern goes on sale. But this Amazon keeps it at ballpark price all the time. Praying I get this under my Subscribe and Save in May, after TP-Armageddon. :/
customer_reviews.author: C.M.

customer_reviews.title: It changed and it’s not the same!!
customer_reviews.text: Update 12/2/2018: Something changed and the tp is nowhere nearly as soft as the first batch I ordered a few months ago. I compared them side by side and the difference was quite substantial. My husband noticed too and asked me if I got new tp. I’m disappointed and will switch back to Charmin next time... ——— Like many people, my holy grail TP is Charmin Ultra soft. Presto's Ultra Soft is not Charmin but nothing really is anyway. In my opinion, Presto is comparable to Quilted Northern and less plush than Charmin. I used to rotate between Charmin and Quilted Northern (depending on the prices/sales), but now I will only rotate between Presto's and Charmin.
customer_reviews.author: River Nami

customer_reviews.title: Price gouging!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great toilet paper. It's a shame Amazon raise the price $25 amongst coronavirus pandemic. Price gouging is illegal.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Percolate

customer_reviews.title: Not mega-rolls
customer_reviews.text: The Great Value store brand, generic toilet paper mega-roll is 280 sq ft per 6 pack. This Amazon "mega-roll" is only 205 sq ft per 6 pack. "Mega-roll" is obviously not a standardized term across the industry, but Amazon is obviously deceitful in marketing these as "mega-rolls." These are not a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: NOT EVEN GOOD FOR ONE WIPE!
customer_reviews.text: Falls apart with the first wipe. It's also a reduced size in width, just like charmin. It also claims that one of their rolls equals 6 regular rolls. I've never seen a regular roll that only holds 77 sheets/suares. They kept the price and cut the width of the roll! Bad, bad quality, I would never buy again. Tried to wipe some lipstick of, and after one swipe I ended up with a load of white fuzzies ALL over them.
customer_reviews.author: Imjusttellinthetruth

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t compare to name brands
customer_reviews.text: I’ve read reviews raving about the quality of this brand, over and above name brands like Charmin. This is not true at all. First, if this is considered ultra-soft then I quake at the thought of using the ultra-strong version. The texture is rough and just overly-thick enough that it’s unwieldy to tear off a reasonable length and use. The roll seems large but it’s deceiving because of the thickness of the sheets. All i know is that these don’t last as long as a roll of Charmin. These will do in a pinch since it seems like name brands are out of stock everywhere, but they definitely don’t stack up in comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Alice L

customer_reviews.title: Not a good substitute for the Ultra Strong version - too soft and poor value
customer_reviews.text: Amazon cancelled my long standing subscription to the Ultra Strong version of this product and offered this as a substitute. I didn't think my family would notice but they did. This Ultra Soft version is soft and absorbent but it shreds during use--adult females particularly dislike it. I am cancelling my subscription and going back to Charmin Ultra Strong--which Amazon doesn't seem to be able to get in stock. I don't recommend this Presto version--for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: KBD

customer_reviews.title: Works fine...BUT this stuff SHEDS.
customer_reviews.text: It's absorbent, I haven't noticed that it disintegrates on contact with moisture, and it's definitely soft. So far so good. However, this paper creates dust like no other, and it leaves behind remnants in uncomfortable places. I don't know if I'm just now noticing this or something changed, but it has become more of a problem with the last two deliveries. I'm going to nope this product for now, and I might revisit later to see if things changed.
customer_reviews.author: B. Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Better than Charmin & Cottonelle
customer_reviews.text: Charmin and Cottonelle can suck it, because this is some great toilet paper. It's THICK, and it doesn't leave lint everywhere. If you're used to thin TP like Angel Soft, you're in for a major surprise, because this is velvety and strong. I'm thrilled that Amazon is coming out with so many household basics, because they're totally killing it. I've repurchased this and other basics multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Replicant

customer_reviews.title: Soft but beware of lint!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time purchasing this product and was excited to try. The price was very reasonable and I was also looking for septic safe toilet paper. The produce was very soft but wasn’t very strong and leaves quiet a bit of lint. Was disappointed with this product, I was hoping for better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very linty
customer_reviews.text: It's soft, thick and I like it. However, when I use it on my face after applying makeup, it leaves lint on my face. The thickness of the TP makes me wonder if it is really safe for pipes. It's not that much of a cost savings that I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: LKinVA

customer_reviews.title: Almost as good as Charmin
customer_reviews.text: I am a toilet paper snob, can't stand the cheap stuff and after some trial and error have been a faithful Charmin Ultra Strong loyal consumer for years now. This got such good reviews and was compared to my fav, so decided to give it a try. It is most definitely not Charmin but not bad especially for the money. It is a little smaller, more narrow and doesn't feel quite as thick or soft but will continue to buy for my hall and 1/2 baths. I will also give some to my kids to replace their crappy 1 ply junk when I go over there. so I am saving money by only buying Charmin for my personal bathroom
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Shreds too easily. Sad, because I wanted to like it!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have any qualms about using generic items as long as they are of high quality. Some stores, I know I can use their brand of things and it’s just as good as the name brand but at a better cost. Unfortunately, that was not the case with this toilet paper. It shredded and left remnants behind that caused itching on skin. Thankfully, Amazon has excellent customer service and they issued me a refund. I will stick on a reliable Angel Soft for now.
customer_reviews.author: Classroomcalledlife

customer_reviews.title: Low price reflects low quality. The toilet paper shreds easily.
customer_reviews.text: At first this toilet paper seems very well priced but it's unfortunate that the price reflects the quality. It is very weak toilet paper that does not hold up well at all. Shreds of toilet paper come off during use and you end up needing a separate wipe to wipe off the shreds.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie K.

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes yes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy Charmin but now I buy this.. nice thick, soft rolls.
customer_reviews.author: Allfruit

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: These were not expensive paper towels but I still expected better quality. It is IMPOSSIBLE to tear these paper towels at the perforated line. No matter how fast/slow or at what angle I try to tear one off at, it rips in pieces. Perhaps I'm alone on this, but it is super annoying to have pieces of paper towels rather than one completely intact. I do not recommend these nor would I repurchase. They're also not super absorbent so you will likely use several at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I have been a die hard Viva paper towel user for years. After seeing these, I decided to give them a try. I have not been disappointed! Absolutely fantastic, thick, absorbent, durable. I will be using these from now on and I hope the price stays where it is. Great product! After falling for the Sparkle ads and being disappointed and not impressed with Bounty or Brawny, I was seriously skeptical. Viva is an amazing product but it does sometimes leave lint. Not with Presto. Seriously, I didn't think these would be that great but they are. I'm very happy with them and will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: momof3boys

customer_reviews.title: Basically gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: It's toilet paper, the price was decent, and it was delivered to my home. I honestly think it gets the job done. Seriously it's toilet paper, what is the big deal?! However, it's the thinnest paper I've ever had the misfortune to give my family. You can literally see through the paper! My spouse and children all agree they dislike this more than brussels sprouts or tofu! My poor kid in college who is truly broke won't even take this to his "crack den" apartment! It's been compared to sand paper and "trash". If I dare to buy this again I'm sure I'll be looking for a new home. Who knew toilet paper would trigger people so much!
customer_reviews.author: Mtngirl

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.text: With people selfishly panic buying and the shelves at the stores being consistently bare , many like myself have been having to "improvise" toilet tissue . When I saw these tissue rolls available I bought them not giving much concern for the quality as I just wanted the quantity . So when they arrived today I was just happy to have them and figured that they will do until my regular brand is available again . Instead I will say that this is my new brand . These rolls are huge and are as soft as a down pillow . They are like Angel Soft mega rolls except bigger and softer . I will buy them again .
customer_reviews.author: Boris

customer_reviews.title: Linty mess
customer_reviews.text: We have a household with two females. Neither liked this toilet paper. It left enough lint after wiping that we had to buy wet wipes to clean up what the toilet paper left behind. We've never used a toilet tissue with this problem before, and we couldn't even finish the package. We actually bought another brand and relegated what was left of this for emergencies only. We can't understand all the positive reviews because neither of us would use this again even if it were free.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Not All Toilet Paper is Created Equal
customer_reviews.text: I’m quite surprised at all the good reviews of this butt paper. Hard to believe I’m writing a review of toilet paper but here I am. Not all are created equal, am I right? While this toilet paper is soft, it’s also very “dusty” or powdery (maybe dry even?). Be warned that it will give you “butt giblets“ which aren’t cool. I also think it ripped easily. Even my husband, who is totally oblivious to anything new, said “Hun, don’t buy this toilet paper again. It sucks.” So, there you have it. The man has spoken; no more butt giblet giving toilet paper in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Beaner67

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT! BEATS NORTHERN TP!
customer_reviews.text: Our family is huge fans of Northern toilet paper in the blue packaging. We have tried tried everything and this has the least amount of lint, best absorbency and value for the cost. I bought PRESTO because of the TP shortage. We were so surprised! It is a great product and really love how Amazon is rivaling Walmart deals and pricing but you can put on auto delivery and it comes to your door!! Doesn't get any easier than that. 5***** A little pricey for a "generic" but pricing will come down as more buy. Highly recommend, save your $ and buy on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: MoonLullaby

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: TP is important no matter the qualities you need in your TP. For us, this checks a lot of boxes - soft, thick enough so it doesn't disintegrate on impact, not dusty, flushes easily and less expense than the bear brand we love. Discovered the Presto during the TP hysteria earlier this year. It is now a permanent brand in our household. Tried both the strong & soft versions of this brand - prefer the soft. We have had no issues with size of the rolls (which are sized like a mega roll) or the packaging and we have bought several times. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paralegal-Diva

customer_reviews.title: Makes my hiney clean
customer_reviews.text: Supper soft comparable to name brands specifically ones that have bears in their commercials that sing about their soft booties.
customer_reviews.author: ashley chancey

customer_reviews.title: Butt saving Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Bro, who knew amazon made its own toilet paper?! In this time of TP crisis, this is a beacon of hope in a gassy world! Thanks Amazon, you have literally saved my butt!!
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Super Thick with out being Ridiculously Soft
customer_reviews.text: I really love this toilet paper. It’s similar to Costco’s Kirkland brand but feels thicker and more absorbent. It’s also not so ridiculously soft. I can’t stand the crazy soft Charmin (I know, I must be a serial killer right;-) so this was a perfect fit for our family without being too soft. It also doesn’t leave that powdery residue behind like some products. I took one star off because the Kirkland toilet paper is still quite a bit cheaper, but if you Subscribe and Save it gets it closer without the hassle of Costco!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Not a good substitution for Charmin Ultra Soft
customer_reviews.text: With the toilet paper shortage, I decided to try something different. The name indicates that it is ultra-soft, so I thought this would be a good substitution for what we had been using. It is not. The surface is somewhat smooth, like paper, so it may take you several swipes to sufficiently clean yourself. As for softness, although it may be smooth, it is no softer than ordinary toilet paper. We will continue to use it till it is gone but we will not be reordering. On the plus side, because of its thickness, it can be used as paper towels or napkins. Should you run out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Marie

customer_reviews.title: Soft, but sheds a lot of lint
customer_reviews.text: While this brand of TP is very soft and is similar to Angel Soft, I have noticed that this brand does have a lot of lint. This TP requires an extra wipe of the toilet seat in order to remove the lint that is created. The TP does not rip or fall apart, but it does shed a lot of lint. I bumped review down an additional star, as I noticed Amazon has increased the subscribe and save price up $3, which now has me thinking about switching back to a more superior product like Angel Soft since the pricing is now more similar.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Better than the TP from a certain membership warehouse chain that starts with C
customer_reviews.text: Two words: No blowouts. This is my favorite TP, and Amazon is able to supply me with just enough to keep us going without greed buying or hoarding.
customer_reviews.author: J.W. Green

customer_reviews.title: Subscribe and save
customer_reviews.text: I got on this plan before the Co-virus and I’m so glad!! They’re still delivering it to us even though they are currently available which is awesome because I thought I had to buy tp from China. Which was 10 very small rolls for 24 dollars. I can’t go to stores because I have a auto immune disease. Plus all they really have here is toilet tissue and no mega rolls. This is very soft and I’ve never noticed it tearing in pieces or being very linty! Though I also use flushable wipes
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: So much toilet paper
customer_reviews.text: I seriously love this toilet paper. I’d only use angel soft then one day I came across this and ordered it. I love this stuff! I’ve ordered 3 or 4 more times since my first try. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashleyann524

customer_reviews.title: As Good as Major Brands
customer_reviews.text: You can choose to pay a ton for the overprice P&G Charmin brands, which continues to increase in price and reduce the amount, or get a bargain with the Presto brand. The Presto brand is just as good as any of the major overpriced brands, but they all need to stop trying to convince consumers that a standard roll is less than 80 sheets. I remember less than 10 years ago when a standard roll was around 150 sheets and probably more prior to that. I got the 24 roll (308 sheets/roll) package for less than $17 when they were on sale ($22 normal price). One 6 pack of Charmin will cost you just about that price.
customer_reviews.author: Len Stoner

customer_reviews.title: Who would have guessed
customer_reviews.text: I decided to order Presto Toilet Paper and I'm glad I did. All I have to say are the reviewers aren’t exaggerating. Preezto is hands-down my new favorite toilet paper. It’s soft, absorbent, and fluffy just like the well-known brands but less expensive. The rolls are bigger and denser, yet it doesn’t clog.
customer_reviews.author: DENISE GONZALEZ

customer_reviews.title: I will look for something else.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this toilet paper because the one that I used for almost 2 years has ceased to be sold. I don't know what happened to the company, but it's gone. I am not happy with the quality of this paper, it is not as soft as expected. It tears easily when used. I will look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Viacheslav N.

customer_reviews.title: One of those necessary items has to be  reliable
customer_reviews.text: I got this compared to Cottonelle Or Northen despite the design print, it was soft but tends to clump together because it absorbs quickly. I want the softness but need a paper that will hold up dry or wet as well as a bigger roll. It made a good back up if I don’t have my favorite in store.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Consumer A

customer_reviews.title: SOFT & Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: BEST EVER: I will be ordering my second box of this toilet paper. It is soft and the same or better than the Sams Club toilet paper. Since I don't subscribe to "Sam's" anymore I can get this at a good price and it's delivered to my door, so no more loading up a shopping cart to handle the item several times before I get it home!! I did not get mine free, I paid for it and you really need to try it, bet you'll be doing what I am and ordering it again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Sue A. Hanke

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan.... wont buy again
customer_reviews.text: This toilet paper is very thick and strong, however it tends to rip along the perforations while using it... it also tends to leave behind white fluffy residue like some toilet tissues do. For the price it’s geeat, but I won’t buy it again. I will stick with my Quilted Northern.
customer_reviews.author: akakizzy

customer_reviews.title: Soft, thick, great quality
customer_reviews.text: When toilet paper was hard to come by during this pandemic we have been in, Amazon cane in the win for TP. And, I was actually shocked at the quality! It’s thick, pretty soft, and durable when wiping. I have zero complaints and I am typically a Quilted Northern fan, which this compares to for me.
customer_reviews.author: JG5797

customer_reviews.title: Strong But Not Very Soft
customer_reviews.text: I'm a devoted Charmin user. I purchased Presto Soft during the TP shortage because I couldn't find Charmin anywhere. The Presto TP is strong but not very soft and kind of scratchy. The rolls are huge and it's a great value for your money but I prefer Charmin, even though it's a lot more expensive. If you're looking for a good, strong TP with good value, Presto is for you. If you don't mind spending more to get a softer TP, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Luv My Dogs

customer_reviews.title: One of our family favorites, with a good balance of soft and strong
customer_reviews.text: We gave this a try during the “great toilet paper shortage of 2020”, during shelter-in-place, because it just happened to be one of the only delivery options available at the time. I usually go for the strong TP and my wife likes the softer variety. I think this one is a great compromise for us, if not a little more on the soft side. We have pretty much been using this one exclusively during the whole Covid-19 scare, buying when we can find it available. We like it well enough that we’d like to make it more permanent by adding it to our subscribe and save, if we ever get the chance.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: good through dirty times
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not Quilted Northern softness but great value for how much is on a roll!!
customer_reviews.author: Aletriss

customer_reviews.title: Charminothin!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I couldn't find tp at the store because I wouldn't likely have tried this! By far the best tp I've ever tried!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Big and soft. Each sheet is thicker than other leading brands. Don’t fit on standard holders. They crumble when dampened, tear easily. I so much wanted to like these, but won’t be buyers again.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Oddo

customer_reviews.title: Too big for TP holders and Scratchy!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. I love Amazon brands usually. I was looking for a replacement for Charmin Ultra Soft Mega rolls because the new Super Mega rolls don’t fit in our TP holders. These rolls didn’t fit either and they are scratchy! This is TMI, but they literally scraped the skin in my butt crack. It was startling to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: TobysMommyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Better prices elsewhere but...
customer_reviews.text: Kudos to Amazon for even having any. I buy these staples once yearly from a big box store however with the pandemic I bought this because my neighbors could not find any in the stores and being able to donate them to families in need, as needed made me happy. Now that the panic seems to behind us, I will save some in case someone knocks again; for now they are in the emergency preparedness kit. Thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Analog Nation

customer_reviews.title: Misleading search results
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is truly soft soft soft, but my bad, I thought I was buying something with 100% recycled pulp, being that was the search I performed on Amazon, and they grouped this product with all products with recycled pump. I call that misdirection, but I should have read it more closely I was more interested in the price at the time... I do think it is purposely deceitful on the part of Amazon however.
customer_reviews.author: Nom

customer_reviews.title: Not Charmin but good!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good toilet paper. Is it charmin ultra soft, no it’s not, but it’s still good. Charmin ultra soft is my favor toilet paper ever! With covid it’s been very hard to find. We’ve been using Kirkland brand from Costco since the beginning of covid, and though it’s a good buy price wise, it’s a terrible toilet paper. It’s not as soft or as absorbent as presto. Presto 1 Kirkland 0 BJs also makes an ultra soft which is better than Kirkland but not as absorbent as presto. It was impossible to find locally. So presto wins again. Presto tears more than charmin and isn’t quite as soft but it makes up for the difference in value.
customer_reviews.author: Boy&DogMom

customer_reviews.title: Great TP!
customer_reviews.text: Usually buy tp at Costco, but with the Coronavirus pandemic, they were constantly out. Lucked out one night & found these on Amazon! Soft & thick. No complaints, except I can't find it available on Amazon again!!
customer_reviews.author: Citprof

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sensitive skin and while this brand was out of stock for the longest time, I kept getting other leading brands... developing rashes and having to use scratchy toilet paper that was supposed to be soft. I miss this toilet paper sooo much and I’m soooo happy it is back in stock! My bottom is going to be super happy! When I first started buying Presto, I was worried it wouldn’t be worth buying in bulk. It totally is worth it! We have this on our subscription list so that we don’t run out unless amazon runs out. Moms- you’ll want this toilet paper postpartum! It’s the best I’ve found for that painful area.
customer_reviews.author: Josh F.

customer_reviews.title: I liked the first box so much, I came back for seconds
customer_reviews.text: The price is comparable to Northern's. The shortage at the start of the pandemic stopped me from using Northern. I was surprised with the size of the rolls. There are 24 per box. I noticed that when I installed it on the roll holder, these rolls almost touch the wall. Northern's rolls had a clearance of at least 1.5 inch clearance to the wall. These rolls are made to do the job. They ARE soft and absorbent. My wife has sensitive skin and she doesn't have any reactions to this brand either. I hear no complaints from her. So I will be constantly ordering my supply from Amazon from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: The Admiral

customer_reviews.title: Lint lint and more lint
customer_reviews.text: It said does not leave lint. As soon as I opened the package there was lint flying around my bathroom! I was wearing black capris and it was all over me!! I expected better for an Amazon product! Will never buy again m!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was told it is "linty"
customer_reviews.text: Grateful to Amazon for making this available. Bought this to help a friend stock up, asked how she liked it and she said, " it is soft but very linty." lol she can buy her own next time. But sharing here in case it helps anyone.
customer_reviews.author: L. M.

customer_reviews.title: Better then Cottonelle!
customer_reviews.text: I was really skeptical about this toilet paper but with people stock piling during the pandemic I was having trouble finding my preferred Cottonelle brand in stores, so I decided to try this. Trust me I do not want to make the owner of Amazon any richer (especially since he doesn’t have to pay taxes) but I cannot deny this TP is great, better than my preferred brand!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: WARNING - NOT SEPTIC SAFE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This toilet paper is NOT septic!!! We had been using Cottonelle or Scotts previously with no issues. We switched to this toilet paper and it plugged up our septic system and caused it to back up. Our septic service company said they have never seen 'septic safe' toilet paper that floats/ and stays together like this stuff does. If you are on a septic and not town sewer, absolutely avoid this toilet paper.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: What I'll remember most about the pandemic is this product
customer_reviews.text: When I recall COVID-19, I'm going to think toilet paper. Its the one product nobody could find for months during a period where nobody could safely leave their house. I was not able to find for a month anybody with this product in stock; there's actually YouTube videos about this phenomenon. Thankfully, Amazon had this product in stock when I was randomly browsing other options - it's actually pretty good! Large quantity, fairly soft, large rolls, good product. The next time the world comes to an end, I wholly recommend purchasing Presto! 308-Sheet Mega Roll Toilet Paper, Ultra-Soft, 24 Count.
customer_reviews.author: E. R. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Super Linty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toilet paper twice. The first time I ordered it the toilet paper was decent for the price but the second was a completely different story. I was so disappointed because it would leave lint and residue like no other toilet paper I’ve ever used. Instead of returning it I gave it to someone in need and advised them that it was super linty. I’m not sure why so many people are giving it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and strong!
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a review a few days ago, but somehow lost it before I finished what I was saying. This is the best toilet paper I have ever used - super soft and strong! At first I could not figure out why there was a blue wrapper and a purple wrapper, but finally got that the purple one was strong and the blue one was soft. I chose the soft as I sometimes have hemorrhoid problems. This paper is better than any of the top brands I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: A. Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Very Decent Toilet Paper
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Amazon Brand - Presto! 308-Sheet Mega Roll Toilet Paper, Ultra-Soft, 24 Count. I actually like this Toilet Paper so much better than my regular brand. The Presto is very soft and sturdy. But, after a few days of using it, I found that it is not working out too well with out septic system. It is just a bit too thick and sturdy for out septic. Such a bummer because I liked it so much better. Now I'm back to what I used before and I'm missing that Amazon Presto luxury ;)
customer_reviews.author: Ella Belle

customer_reviews.title: Good value, comparable quality to name brands
customer_reviews.text: With more than 6,500 reviews I don't expect to add much to the conversation here. But I am glad to have finally tried the Amazon Presto brand toilet paper. I usually use Charmin or Cottonelle - whichever happens to be on sale - and wanted to compare. I like the thickness of the Presto - it seems close to the Charmin Ultra Strong - and is just slightly less soft than the Charmin Ultra Soft. So I would say this is a combination of those two. It is two-ply, which some may need to consider depending on your septic system. But it's a good value and comparable to the popular name brands.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality.
customer_reviews.text: The amount of dust/fuzz this toilet paper sheds is crazy! I'm not even kidding my toilet paper holder is covered in a layer of white from these. I could not wait until we were done with these to get a new kind. It gets all over, and is messy. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: My Goodness
customer_reviews.text: So, this is good TP for the value and I've been buying it for some time. Imagine my surprise today when I went to order a 24-ct. package and find out it's unavailable?! Really people? Hoarding is selfish.
customer_reviews.author: pandag

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good buy
customer_reviews.text: Since COVID, we've been using whatever was available including the ultra thin, gas station type. This is good stuff. I usually bought Charmin Ultra Strong. This is not quite as strong, but is softer, cheaper and thickness is adequate. We go through a lot of this stuff (severe IBS issues) and one to one and a half rolls per day is not unheard of. Even though toilet paper is now more available in stores, I will very likely continue buying this both because of price and quality, not to mention the convenience of home delivery. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cija in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Why I end up with so much toilet paper...
customer_reviews.text: I have too much toilet paper. As I look at the stack of 4-pack mega-rolls, I ask myself, "how did this happen?" I stare at the leaning tower of paper and it comes to me: this product represents comfort, softness, reliability, and economy. Of course I order more than I need in a one-month period. There's fear under there: What will happen two months from now? Will I have this product accessible to me in a few weeks? Should I order enough for three months? How many rolls? My strategy for comfortable, soft reliability on the cheap: today I order enough for 2 months, then sign up for a monthly subscription to start in 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Dubroff

customer_reviews.title: Charmin Who?
customer_reviews.text: Move over Charmin! They’d a new kid in town! We loved this TP! It is just as good as any of the best name brands available! Another Amazon brand has exceeded my expectations again!! Nice and thick, a very generous sized roll but not so big it won’t fit on the dispenser, and it is very soft yet very durable! Couldn’t ask for a better TP! I will definitely be purchasing this TP again!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Best Septic/camper safe toilet paper ever
customer_reviews.text: Presto jumbo rolls are a great value and is soft and strong. Not like those single ply waxy or sandpaper toilet tissues. We tried it, did the water test for breaking down in water. The next time we ordered we doubled it. When we have company over they have asked what we use because they know we are picky about our enviroment and are amazed we didn't cheat on out toilet paper. We are ex charmin users.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tissue
customer_reviews.text: Costco sells their "ultra soft" family rolls (mega) at 30 rolls for around $15. Presto comes the closest to the quality of Costco's best tissue (which I've learned through a documentary they really put it to the test to call it their finest) The big difference is the price. Initially, Presto's price was lower, but it's now a bit higher. Luckily Amazon doesn't require club fees. I love Subscribe & Save because I don't own a car & can order my necessities once a month & with the more you buy, the more you save! Hope they keep their great customer service policies as they are! Love Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: frugal buyer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly pleased! Huge roll, super soft! I ordered because I couldn’t find TP anywhere else due to COVID. These came and I might actually switch from my Kirkland brand to this stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of Four

customer_reviews.title: This is a go to toilet paper!
customer_reviews.text: Ever Since Charmin Basic changed their "Basic" line of toilet paper I have been searching for a tp that offers a not too rough and not too soft without luck. Northern had become my go to but the rolls are absurdly small and it is a bit too soft and thick. Presto is a great product. The rolls are huge! The texture/weight of Presto is right on for me. A great find. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: timmyj3

customer_reviews.title: The Lint! - Updated
customer_reviews.text: Update: I think I've had this on sub and save for about a year now. It is indeed initially thick and the roll is a decent size for the money but there are two issues. 1. SO MUCH LINT. No matter how you wipe or pat. Females especially beware! 2. Thick when dry, thin when wet. Takes more tp to wipe. These two issues became even more apparent when I ran out and bought a random pack of leading tp from the store. No lint. Needed half the sheets, if not a 3rd of the sheets. Great for the price. Very convenient. wish there was less lint, though.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I’ve switched to this brand
customer_reviews.text: During the spring toilet paper shortage I was buying any brand Of TP that was available and was lucky enough to snag a case of this. We are TP brand loyalists and, until now, have only bought Charmin. Presto is every bit as strong, soft, and long-lasting, but at a significant savings. Now that Amazon has this back in stock, we’ll be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: DisneyDiva

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Overall not bad (feeling a little weird rating TP) I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Margo

customer_reviews.title: So thankful for the product and the swift delivery!
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, I trust this Amazon brand as I've made purchases in the past. However, I've never tried the double rolls and I'm so happy I did. During this time while we're all dealing with the effects of COVID-19, I was so happy with the size of the rolls as this meant I didn't have to buy multiple packages, leaving more for others in need. Amazon is awesome because I was originally given a later delivery date, which was fine because I was just happy to know it would eventually come. I would definitely recommend this brand and product.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, rolls are wayyyyyy too large
customer_reviews.text: Softness, strength is just fine, no issues with the product. Got this instead of our normal brand to try it out, and to be honest, it's the same as the larger brand names that also specialize in TP softness. The issue is how large the rolls are. These won't fit in our standard TP holder that sits on top of the toilet, and they won't fit into the built-into-the-wall TP dispenser. You have to use about 20 turns off of the roll before the roll will fit into either. If we had a free-standing, vertical TP holder where you slide these over a single shaft to "stack" the rolls, there would be no issues. But, the rolls are really large.
customer_reviews.author: Some Dude

customer_reviews.title: My new go to brand of toilet paper.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, just received my Presto Amazon brand toilet paper and I am surprised at the quality and softness. I usually use Charmin or other name brand toilet paper, but Presto is my new brand. The rolls are huge and wider than the tissue I have been using which means I will have to change out rolls less often. Thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Luca

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: We have officially switched toilet paper brands. Presto is very comparable to toilet paper monsters Charmin, Cottonelle, and Angel Soft. We switched our paper towels and toilet paper over to Presto. You are getting great quality for the money. I would get angry if my wife would by generic because I want the BEST toilet paper money can buy. One day I came across these and decided I would buy a box and if I didn't like them, they would go into my wife's bathroom because she is not nearly as picky. After receiving them, we found them to be very durable and relatively soft. The savings make this brand a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: The Count of Monte Crisco

customer_reviews.title: Watch out other Brands !!
customer_reviews.text: Very Impressed over the Quality Of this paper, I’m a Picky Person when it comes to toilet paper.. I’ve laid out 3 brands for you to compare.. Weirdly I don’t see much difference in Walmart Brand and Presto,.. I asked my husband which of these two did he prefer, he said “Presto” was thicker.. He did not know the names of them. I just gave him 3 squares of each.. But in Photo “Walmart” seems a tad larger.. But Presto is def softer.. I’m very Pleased with this brand.. Can’t wait to try the Paper Towels if I can ever get them since this Virus ..
customer_reviews.author: Cheri D. Lovell

customer_reviews.title: Lint Residue is Nasty!
customer_reviews.text: This TP is the “lintiest” ever. By lint I mean tiny paper fiber residue that remains on your skin (in places you don’t want it) until you use cupped hand water, a douche, bidet, or shower to cleanse it off. It’s AWFUL. Sure, it is soft, but you’re just smearing your excrement around and not really cleaning. Opposite of scratchy, but the residue is equally uncomfortable/unpleasant. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good quality
customer_reviews.text: This paper is pretty good but the value if almost the same as other brands if you buy them in bulk from your local club especially with coupons. As far as the quality these are fine, they do the job and you don't need a handful to feel clean. The only think I have noticed is that they make more dust, meaning I have noticed a lot more white fluffy dust on the thing that holds the roll in place then ever before with any other brand. (which isn't really a problem just a side comment) Otherwise its worth a try if you don't have bulk stores in your area.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet paper and even better delivery!
customer_reviews.text: This toilet paper is really great, I love the fact that I can get it delivered to my apartment without having to think about it and it’s actually good toilet paper! It’s thick and soft and doesn’t fall apart easily, it’s on par with other good toilet paper brands like charmin for a great price. I started ordering this with a subscription over a year ago and I haven’t had to buy toilet paper anywhere else since then!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE AND QUALITY!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a car, so buying a boatload of toilet paper has never been an easy task...not to mention a little bit embarrassing. Thanks to Amazon, I don't have to walk home with a stack looking like I use a lot of toilet paper. The big roles are definitely nice for lazy people like me who can't be bothered to change the role frequently. The quality of the paper is also pretty good. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ruch

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, I'm not sure why I'm writing a review about tp but why not in the day and age of the internet when people like to write about random stuff. First - it works. Upon opening the package, I found the rolls of toilet paper to be nicely rolled with tidy edges and no fuzz. I hate fuzzy toilet paper. It leaves dust on the person and on the toilet paper roll holder. This version of tp doesn't seem to emit fuzz like some. Next - it works. I've used it for a day now and haven't found anything to complain about. I guess I'll be back again to buy it. Why not? It works!
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: No one could tell a difference!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these in a bit of a panic when the world started to run out of paper products. As dedicated Charmin users, my wife was a bit skeptical. insert: she was annoyed I bought them. But - the quality was fantastic. The rolls were large and everybody's butts were happy! So its a win win! just ordered more!
customer_reviews.author: PMO

customer_reviews.title: Has fragrance doesn’t indicate on package
customer_reviews.text: I’m reading these q&a’s for this reason. My packaging is identical yet there is a clear fragrance. This has caused irritation that required treatment. If you are sensitive stay away from this product. All the reviews indicate large variances in the product. Perhaps they are packaging products from other manufacturers and scented slipped through....either way order with caution and return if scented- it won’t be worth the discomfort and co-pay making this the most expensive toilet paper going.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetfreedom

customer_reviews.title: Presto ultra soft will leave "crumbs" on your butt
customer_reviews.text: I switched from Charmin to Presto ultra soft because many good reviews. NO!!!! They will leave white shredds on your butt! Just a little touching on the butt, not even smear it . I tried using this toilet paper touched my face when my acne broke out, just a little touch, it leaves white "crumbs" all around my acne spot. So image what will happen when you use this kind of quality paper to wipe the butt. It is not as soft as Charmin soft. The picture is I used my hand just tore one part off, and look at my finger tips, white paper crumbs!
customer_reviews.author: mia

product_meta.title: Amazon Brand - Presto! 308-Sheet Mega Roll Toilet Paper, Ultra-Soft, 24 Count
product_meta.description: Presto! Ultra-Soft Toilet Paper offers great softness with the strength you need. This septic-safe bath tissue leaves less lint behind versus the leading ultra-premium soft brand, based on laboratory testing. Each mega roll lasts 4X longer than a regular roll of toilet paper (based on a regular roll with 77 sheets). Presto! Ultra-Soft Toilet Paper is PEFC certified and made with pulp sourced from sustainably managed forests and controlled sources. Mega Rolls are our longer-lasting rolls. For small roll holders, try Presto! 176-sheet Roll Toilet Paper.
feature_bullets: Includes 24 Mega Rolls (4 Packs of 6 Mega Rolls) with 308 2-ply sheets per roll
24 Mega Rolls = 96 Regular Rolls (based on a regular roll with 77 sheets)
Leaves less lint behind (versus the leading Ultra-Premium Soft Brand, based on laboratory testing)
Made with pulp sourced from sustainably managed forests and controlled sources
Mega Rolls are our longer-lasting rolls. For small roll holders, try Presto! 176-sheet Roll Toilet Paper
Running low? Restock by asking, “Alexa, order Presto! toilet paper” through your Alexa device
Satisfaction Guarantee: We’re proud of our products. If you aren’t satisfied, we’ll refund you for any reason within a year of purchase. 1-877-485-0385

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
